name: Zombie Mayhem (Zilox)
description:
"Zombie Mayhem: " is a survival-action game that takes place in a deserted town deep in the forest. The player takes on the role of a survivor searching for supplies and must fend off a constant wave of zombies and monsters. 

The player must navigate the town and its surrounding areas, looting abandoned buildings for ammunition, as well as purchasing new weapons from the in-game vendor. The player's combat skills and resourcefulness will be tested as they attempt to survive against the relentless zombie horde. 

In "Zombie Mayhem: ", players will face a challenging experience as they navigate through the dangerous world filled with zombies and monsters. With its focus on action, scavenging, and combat, the game will test a player's skills and ability to survive.
